price: Nta n’ubwo twigeze tubarenganya, ahubwo ni bo bari inkozi z’ibibi.
arabic: وَمَا ظَلَمۡنَٰهُمۡ وَلَٰكِن كَانُواْ هُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wamā ẓalamnāhum walākin kānū humu al-ẓālimīna
